name: Duties of department
text:
§94-1  Duties of department.  The department of accounting and general services shall collect all public archives; preserve, arrange, describe, and inventory the same; provide for their safekeeping; and compile and furnish information concerning them.  The department may adopt and use a seal and may adopt, amend, or revise from time to time such rules and regulations as it may consider expedient for the conduct of its business. [L 1905, c 24, §2; RL 1945, §31; am L 1945, c 238, §1; RL 1955, §13-5; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §12; HRS §94-1; am L 2013, c 88, §2]
 
Cross References
 
  General authority of department, see §26-6.
 
Case Notes
 
  Cited:  35 H. 608, 619.
